description: Primes p with the following property: let d_1, d_2, ... be the distinct digits occurring in the decimal expansion of p. Then for each d_i, dropping all the digits d_i from p produces a prime number, and for each digit pair (d_i, d_j), dropping all the digits d_i and all the digits d_j from p also produces a prime number. Leading 0's are not allowed.
